response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. I believe this offer presents a unique chance for you to acquire something truly exceptional without breaking the bank. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or operations.", "product_price": 7500}
